<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Thamir (The Silent Blade)](/Deities.aspx?ID=158)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Seize any opportunity that would benefit you, solve your problems With Violence, hide your true intentions

**Anathema** Steal from the poor, beg for help or mercy from a fellow worshipper of Thamir

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

**Domains** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=1), [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=4), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=36)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Penumbral Shroud](/Spells.aspx?ID=582)

- **3rd**
[Invisibility Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=165)

- **6th**
[Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=199)

</column>
name: Thamir (The Silent Blade)
